Topic Summary: Appeal against a Revenue assessment for the repayment of VAT regarding the cancellation of registration
Tax Legislation: Section 5 of the Value Added Tax Consolidation Act, 2020 ("VATCA 2010"); Section 6 of the VATCA 2010; Section 6(1)(d) of the VATCA 2010: Section 8 of the VATCA 2010; Regulation 3 of S.I. 639 of 2010 (“the VAT Regulations 2010”);
